text: Girolamo Grillo (18 August 1930, Parghelia - 22 August 2016, Odorheiu Secuiesc) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1954, Grillo served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Civitavecchia- Tarquinia, Italy from 1988 to 2006.Diocese of Civitavecchia-Tarquinia ==See also== *Roman Catholicism in Italy ==Notes== Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Girolamo Grillo
